project.name: template-builder
project.description: This target provides support to replace properties from a text file using values from the ROM image configuration.

target.name: template-builder
target.hlm:python:
import configuration import integration.templatebuilder import os import logging
# Enabling info outputing. logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)
configBuilder = configuration.NestedConfigurationBuilder(open(r'${rombuild.config.file.parsed}', 'r')) configSet = configBuilder.getConfiguration() for product in r'${product.list}'.split(','): builder = integration.templatebuilder.TemplateBuilder(configSet, product) builder.build()
